CMR Central
This is the shopping mall locted in maddilapalem, the best shopping mall in vizag, it has a food court on top floor, quality food restaurants like mcd, kfc, pizza hut etc.. This mall has inox which has better experience of the cinema.. Best place to hangout with friends and family members.
Visit
Central
Vizag Central is a shopping mall in Visakhapatnam, India, located on the Suryabagh the mall is operating with the Central Brand .[1] The mall has cinemas,food courts, cloth stores, gaming, books, coffee shops and restaurants. The shopping space is spread over four levels with Mukta Cinemas located on fifth floor.[2] The mall was launched in 2011 the owners, Future Group, all type of brands are available in this mall.

South India Shopping Mall
One of the best places to shop for clothing in Vizag. They offer great discounts on good clothing during festive seasons. Even the exchange process is very simple and staff are helpful in providing the exchange. Nice range for all age groups., https://indiapl.com/andhra/south-india-shopping-mall-vizag-154849
